text: Supplied video obtained Wednesday, October 30, 2019, of UK Prime Minister Boris Johnson speaking in the House of Commons during a debate on the Early Parliamentary General Election Bill. Johnson says there is only one way to get Brexit done, and that is to "refresh this Parliament and give people a choice". "There is only way to restore the esteem in which our democracy is held and to recover the respect in which parliament should be held by the people of this country, and that is finally to offer ourselves to the judgment of the people of this country, and I commend this bill to the House." (AAP VIDEO/Supplied/parliamentlive.tv)
